snippet.title: Qanga Game Official Trailer DEMO NOV 2023
snippet.description:
Independent development. All images are recorded directly in game.

Dive deep into the QANGA saga, where the vast reaches of space and the pursuit of survival intertwine in a universe unlike anything you've experienced. Embody a denizen from one of humanity's last strongholds: the majestic ICLab Industry complex. Suspended in cryostasis, your character seamlessly integrates with a cyborg—a technological marvel spawned from the visionary labs of ICLab.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1648190/QANGA/

Please bear in mind that at iolaCorpStudio, our development team is made up of enthusiasts, and our budget is quite limited. Please understand that we do our best with the means at our disposal. Qanga is a game in development, and demo (Nov 2023) gives you the chance to get involved right from the start. It is important to note that the current game demo does not fully represent the final.


Music : Carl Johan Renault.
Voice : AI Generate.
